books.title: So Big
books.author: Edna Ferber
books.summary: A woman discovers her own inner strength when she decides to teach children in a rural farming area.

books.title: The Son of Tarzan
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Upon discovering his father’s past life in the jungles of Africa, Tarzan’s son sets out to follow in his footsteps.

books.title: Yashka
books.author: Maria Bochkareva
books.summary: A Russian peasant leaves exile in Siberia to fight for her country in World War I.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: A Little Princess
books.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
books.summary: A young girl discovers a life of unexpected challenges when she goes to live at a London boarding school.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Edgar Allan Poe
books.summary: A collection of Edgar Allan Poe’s short fiction, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Troilus and Cressida
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A Trojan prince falls in love with a woman amid the Trojan War, only to see her exchanged to the Greeks for a prisoner of war.

books.title: Figures of Earth
books.author: James Branch Cabell
books.summary: A young swineherd rises to the rank of Count by following his own thinking and desires.

books.title: Anne of the Island
books.author: L. M. Montgomery
books.summary: A young woman learns life lessons while away at college and during visits back home.

books.title: The Magician
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A young engaged couple meet a mysterious man who claims to have practical knowledge of the occult.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: The Mystery of Orcival
books.author: Émile Gaboriau
books.summary: A countess is murdered and suspects are quickly detained, but Lecoq is not satisfied and looks in a different direction to solve the case.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.

books.title: The Kingdom of God Is Within You
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.summary: Tolstoy describes true Christianity as a non-hierarchical, nonviolent, non-coercive pursuit, and criticizes institutional Christianity as a deceptive corruption.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Sarah Louisa Forten Purvis
books.summary: A collection of poems by Sarah Louisa Forten Purvis.

books.title: Zuleika Dobson
books.author: Max Beerbohm
books.summary: A beautiful magician unsuspectingly casts her charms on quiet Oxford.

books.title: Search the Sky
books.author: Frederik Pohl
books.summary: A man visits several worlds as he attempts to discover why humanity is dying out.

books.title: Short Science Fiction
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.summary: A collection of short science fiction by Isaac Asimov, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: Gitanjali
books.author: Rabindranath Tagore
books.summary: Prose poems of offering translated by the author from the original Bengali.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Henry David Thoreau
books.summary: A collection of Henry David Thoreau’s essays.
